songs.title: Kriss Kross
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Kool A.D.]
Fresh Prince, Moneyball, brain drain, Autobahn
Bay Bridge, Elian, alien, cowboy, MTV
Yo, linguistics
Go linguistics, go linguistics, go
Word up, the invisible, most incredible
Idiot trill wizard dream musician
Kool spit writtens to kittens
Too sick with it to kick it any different
Plenty different
She looking at me like "ooh, you different"
She ain't too specific
You ain't need to be too specific to kick it
Oceanic, Pacific
Don't panic, I understand a little bit
Game so vigorous, brain so slipperish
Mane, go figure it, mane
So lit up like a cigarette
K to the O, hiccup
To the O to the ella, ella, ella, A
A, B, baby, play me then pay me
I'm JD, that's Dilla
Plus Jermaine Dupri fo rilla
(Laughs) Not rilla (laughs)
